Docs.summary: Enables a workflow service to receive data in the form of parameters . is interoperable with non-workflow WCF clients and services. The collection is similar to the argument declaration on a C# method signature.The collection cannot contain arguments marked with , or of type . Use for these types of data. This is a sealed class.
